page.title: 08Media
page.content: Cheddleton has its own Local Historical Society Cheddleton Historical and Archaeological Society formed in 1976 who have published a very comprehensive 'Cheddleton,North Staffs. A village History'. A booklet published by Vera Priestman, published in 1978 - 'Cheddleton Remembered' has recollections covering the past century. 'Education in Chedleton' by Vera Priestman. Guide to Cheddleton Church (St. Edward the Confessor)1973 Robert Milner 3rd Edition Cheddleton. Parish Registers Vol.1 1974, Vol.2 1975, Vol.3 1978, Vol.4 1985. St Edwards Church and St. Andrews (Methodist) Church share the same monthly magazine. The area is served by BBC Radio Stoke on Trent and Independant Signal Radio. The Evening Sentinel, published in Hanley,is available in Cheddleton.
